summary: Just a small mod to make Serana non-essential, since "setessential 0" doesn't work on her.
descriptionHtml:
Just a small mod to make Serana non-essential, since "setessential 0" doesn't work on her.
Serana is also not in a protected state, so this will make your Dawnguard quests more challenging (unless you try to kill her at 1st site like a proper vampire hunter and ruin the DLC like me). XD
Perfect if you want to kill Serana.
author: Zer0-Scope
